TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit MessageEncoder extends System.Object

summary.span: 编码器是用于将消息写入到流中并从流中读取消息的组件。

span.span: The encoder is the component that is used to write messages to a stream and to read messages from a stream.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是一个基类，它提供支持多用途 Internet 邮件扩展（MIME）内容类型和消息版本的实现，并根据该内容类型定义用于序列化和反序列化消息的接口。 is a base class that provides implementations that support a Multipurpose Internet Mail Extensions (MIME) content type and message version, and defines the interface for the serialization and deserialization of messages according to that content type. 将其作为基类，用于编写您自己的自定义编码器。Use it as a base class for writing your own custom encoder. 如果希望实现自定义消息编码器，请使用此类。Use this class if you want to implement a custom message encoder. 若要实现自己的自定义消息编码器，您必须提供下列抽象基类的自定义实现：To implement your own custom message encoder, you must provide custom implementations of the following abstract base classes: - - - 重写 以返回自定义 的实例。Override the to return an instance of your custom . 然后通过重写 方法返回此工厂的实例，将自定义 连接到用于配置服务或客户端的绑定元素堆栈。Then wire up your custom to the binding element stack used to configure the service or client by overriding the method to return an instance of this factory. 在消息的内存表示形式和可以写入流中的 XML 信息集 (Infoset) 表示形式之间进行转换的任务被包装到 类中，该类通常作为支持特定类型 XML 编码的 XML 读取器和 XML 编写器的工厂。The task of converting between the in-memory representation of a message and an XML Information Set (Infoset) representation that can be written to a stream is encapsulated within the class, which most commonly serves as a factory for XML readers and XML writers that support specific types of XML encodings. 的主要方法包括 和 。The key methods on are and . 采用 对象，并将其写入到 对象。 takes a object and writes it into a object. 采用 对象和最大标头大小，并返回 对象。 takes a object and a maximum header size and returns a object. ## Examples 下面的代码演示一个派生自 的类的示例。The following code shows an example of a class that is derived from . [!code-csharp[S_UE_CustomTextMessageEncoder#0](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_ue_customtextmessageencoder/cs/customtextmessageencoder.cs#0)]

summary.span: 在派生类中重写时，获取编码器使用的 MIME 内容类型。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, gets the MIME content type used by the encoder.

value.span: 受消息编码器支持的内容类型。

span.span: The content type that is supported by the message encoder.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 该内容类型是显示在 MIME 消息的开头处以及独立正文部分中的多用途 Internet 邮件扩展 (MIME) 标头。The content type is a Multipurpose Internet Mail Exchange (MIME) header that appears at the beginning of a MIME message as well as within the separate body parts. 内容类型标头用于指定消息正文中数据的媒体类型和子类型、完全指定消息正文中数据的媒体类型和子类型，以及指定数据的字符编码（可选）。Content-type headers are used to specify the media type and subtype of data in the body of a message and to fully specify the media type and subtype of data in the body of a message and to specify the character encoding (optional) of the data. 可以支持的 MIME 内容类型的示例： "application/soap + xml;字符集 = "utf8" "。An example of a MIME content type that can be supported: "application/soap+xml; charset=’utf8’". [RFC 2045](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=95945)的第5.1 节中介绍了详细说明 content-type 标头语法的语法。A grammar that details the syntax of the content-type header is described in [RFC 2045](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=95945), Section 5.1. [RFC 2046](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=95944)提供了有关 MIME 媒体类型及其参数的详细信息。[RFC 2046](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=95944) provides detailed information on MIME media types and their parameters. ## Examples [!code-csharp[S_UE_CustomTextMessageEncoder#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_ue_customtextmessageencoder/cs/customtextmessageencoder.cs#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此方法可请求从通道堆栈的适当层返回一个类型化对象，如用于设置属性或获取状态的接口。Use this to request a typed object such as an interface for setting properties or getting status from the appropriate layer in the channel stack. 如果某个层支持返回所请求的对象，则该层会返回对象。If a layer supports returning the requested object, it returns it. 如果不支持，则该层会将调用委托给堆栈中的下一层。If not, it delegates the call down to the next layer in the stack. 如果到达堆栈底部仍然没有通道层支持所请求的对象，则该方法返回 `null`。If it gets to the bottom of the stack and no channel layer supported the requested object, then the method returns `null`.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法用于根据消息编码器的内容类型来确定消息编码器是否可用于读取特定样式的消息。This method is used to determine whether the message encoder can be used to read a particular style of message, based on its content-type. 类中的信息用于描述消息中包含的数据，还用于确定是否有匹配的内容类型。The information in the class is used to describe the data that is contained in a message and is used to determine if there is a content-type match. [RFC 2045](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=95945)第5.1 节中介绍了详细说明 content-type 标头语法的语法。A grammar that details the syntax of the content-type header is described in [RFC 2045](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=95945) Section 5.1. [RFC 2046](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=95944)提供了有关多用途 Internet 邮件扩展（MIME）媒体类型及其参数的详细信息。[RFC 2046](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=95944) provides detailed information on Multipurpose Internet Mail Extensions (MIME) media types and their parameters. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何重写此方法来处理具有相同媒体类型的不同内容类型。The following code example shows how to override this method to handle different content types with the same media type. [!code-csharp[S_UE_CustomTextMessageEncoder#8](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_ue_customtextmessageencoder/cs/customtextmessageencoder.cs#8)] [!code-csharp[S_UE_CustomTextMessageEncoder#8](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_ue_customtextmessageencoder/cs/customtextmessageencoderfactory.cs#8)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法由 调用。This method is called by . ## Examples 下面的代码演示如何实现 方法。The following code shows how to implement the method. [!code-csharp[S_UE_CustomTextMessageEncoder#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_ue_customtextmessageencoder/cs/customtextmessageencoder.cs#6)]
